00032 // CedrusXidDeviceEnumerator.cpp : Implementation of CCedrusXidDeviceEnumerator
00033 
00034 #include "stdafx.h"
00035 #include "CedrusXidDeviceEnumerator.h"
00036 #include "CedrusXidResponseDevice.h"
00037 #include "xid_device_scanner_t.h"
00038 #include "xid_con_t.h"
00039 #include "xid_device_t.h"
00040 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00041 
00042 using namespace public_nbs;

00044 // CCedrusXidDeviceEnumerator
00045 
00046 CCedrusXidDeviceEnumerator::CCedrusXidDeviceEnumerator()
00047 {
00048     // lookup the path to this DLL.  The devconfig files are stored along 
00049     // with it.
00050     HMODULE module = GetModuleHandle(L"CedrusXidDriver.dll");
00051     if(module)
00052     {
00053         wchar_t result[MAX_PATH];
00054 
00055         if(GetModuleFileName(module, result, sizeof(result)) != 0)
00056         {
00057             devconfig_location_ = std::wstring(result);
00058             std::size_t pos = devconfig_location_.find_last_of(L"\\") + 1;
00059             devconfig_location_.erase(pos);
00060         }
00061     }
00062 
00063     devices_.resize(port_info_.detect_valid_xid_devices());
00064 }
00065 
00066 STDMETHODIMP CCedrusXidDeviceEnumerator::getDeviceCount(unsigned long *count)
00067 {
00068     *count = devices_.size();
00069     return S_OK;
00070 }
00071 
00072 STDMETHODIMP CCedrusXidDeviceEnumerator::getDevice(
00073     unsigned long index, IResponseDevice **device)
00074 {
00075     HRESULT rval = S_OK;
00076     
00077     if(index >= devices_.size())
00078     {
00079         last_error_ = 
00080             L"Invalid index passed to CedrusXidDeviceEnumerator::getDevice";
00081         rval = E_FAIL;
00082     }
00083     else
00084     {
00085         try
00086         {
00087             if(!devices_[index].get())
00088             {
00089                 // device not yet created
00090                 // create it here.
00091                 devices_[index] = devices_[index].create(
00092                     CLSID_CedrusXidResponseDevice, IID_IResponseDevice);
00093 
00094                 CCedrusXidResponseDevice *dev = static_cast<CCedrusXidResponseDevice*>(
00095                     devices_[index].get());
00096 
00097                 if(dev)
00098                 {
00099                     boost::shared_ptr<cedrus::xid_con_t> xid_con = 
00100                         port_info_.connection_at_index(index);
00101                     xid_con->open();
00102 
00103                     boost::shared_ptr<cedrus::xid_device_t> xid_device(
00104                         new cedrus::xid_device_t(xid_con,
00105                                                  devconfig_location_));
00106 
00107                     dev->set_xid_device(xid_device);
00108                 }
00109             }
00110 
00111             if(!devices_[index].get())
00112             {
00113                 last_error_ = L"Failed to create IResponseDevice";
00114                 rval = E_FAIL;
00115             }
00116             else
00117             {
00118                 *device = devices_[index].get();
00119                 (*device)->AddRef();
00120             }
00121         }
00122         catch(Exception &e)
00123         {
00124             last_error_ = e.message();
00125             rval = E_FAIL;
00126         }
00127         catch(...)
00128         {
00129             last_error_ = L"Unknown exception creating IResponseDevice";
00130             rval = E_FAIL;
00131         }
00132     }
00133 
00134     return rval;
00135 }
00136 
00137 STDMETHODIMP CCedrusXidDeviceEnumerator::getLastError(BSTR *error)
00138 {
00139     *error = SysAllocString(last_error_.c_str());
00140     return S_OK;
00141 }
